A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
DONT WORRY IF YOU HAVENT SEEN IT.....NO SPOILERS HERE!
I went to this on the opening night\, with my two sons.
We had managed to avoid spoilers and had only watched the teaser and full trailer. I did not want the movie to end.....so many great moments ....And more than a few surprises.
No wonder Rian Johnston has been given a full trilogy of his own to make\, this really is a great movie!
The reviews were saying best since Empire......dont they always say that? My view is that it really is the best one since Empire ie this is the first time (in my opinion) that one of the original trilogy has been bettered (Return of the Jedi)

My boys loved it too!

The force is strong with this one! Sorry I couldnt resist.....ha ha
